txt.en: You have selected Signar as your favourite to win
The race has begun! Betting is now closed
Signar has won the race!
You have a vested interest in Signar's success as he runs the Summer Festival Keg-hopping Race.
Signar has lost the race
Signar has lost the race
Signar has lost the race
You have left the race area

'Well, [placeholder], good day to you!

'These lazy summer days can drag on, which is why we look forward to the Festival events! This year, inhabitants of Thorin's Hall are racing to finish the Keg-hopping Race event as quickly as possible. Who do you think will win?

'So you want my opinion, do you? Well, I am not supposed to tell, but...I will make an exception. Signar comes from a long line of experienced drinkers, you see. I don't see how anyone would be able to best him with heritage like his! Would you like to support Signar for this round? It is a wise choice.'

The Keg-hopping Race begins soon on this very track. Tickets for the race can be picked up in the inn in Thorin's Hall.\n\nYou will need to hand over a Festival Ticket in order to select a Signar as your favourite to win.
'I see you had some luck at the keg-races! Allow me to be the first to bid you congratulations on your excellent luck, [placeholder]. Here is your reward.'
The Keg-Hopping Race begins soon on this very track.\n\nYou have guessed that Signar will win the race, and you should observe whether or not this comes to pass.
Arnar can be found in the Keg-race area during the Summer Festival.\n\nYou should speak with Arnar and collect the bountiful prize he has to offer for your excellent luck.
'Watch the race, [placeholder]! How do you think Signar will make out?'
'You think Signar's your dwarf? Well then, hand me one of your Festival Tickets, and I'll jot down your wager on him.\n\n'Good luck, [placeholder]!'
'Sorry, [placeholder]. I'm afraid you'll need a Festival Ticket in order to select a contestant.\n\n'Jorfi is handing out tickets in Thorin's Hall; I'd go see him right away!'
Turn in a Festival Ticket to select Signar
Observe the race to see if Signar is victorious
Talk to Arnar
Do not leave the race area
Keg-hopping Race: Signar's Swift Step
